title: Geobukeon
author: Verdigris0
pages:
A Geobukeon, also
known as a turtle ship
in western
descriptions was a
type of large Korean
warship used during
the Joseon dynasty.
They were used in the
fight against invaiding
japanese naval ships.
This desgin has been
described by some as
the first eve
world. (it might be
korean okay but it
defended against
japan so its okay in
this build area i hope)
-by Verdigris0, have
fun pronouncing it
